title: Zilean things I would like added.
body:
**Passive**
Instant passive.. with notifications for teammates to know when they can get exp.
That or let Zilean still move while he channels.

**Bombs**
Extended attach range for allies.
Extended explosion range on allies.

**Rewind**
Should take off 1 second of recall each rank.

Honestly with all of the ADC's running around with Rapid Fire Cannon, Zil has to play extremely far back to do anything in teamfights.
He is in kill range when running up to slow enemy champs.. these few changes I think would push Zilean into the right direction.
He is also in a mana deficit when trying to shove waves (Q W Q)

replies.body: Zilean has one of the highest win rates in the game and the only reason he's escaping nerfs is because he's rarely banned. He probably deserves nerfs, not massive buffs.
